turkish_example_sentence: Biz ormanda değerli mantar bulmuşsak, pazarda satabilirdik.
english_example_sentence: If we had found the valuable mushroom in the forest, we could have sold it at the market.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы нашли ценный гриб в лесу, мы бы смогли продать его на рынке.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz ormanda değerli mantar ______, pazarda satabilirdik.
